title: WP8 - Feedback, Control and Alignment
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: For the development of future particle accelerators. Electronics Cultural,Economic
findingsText: Beam control for achieving high luminosity at future particle colliders. They can be implemented in future particle accelerators. Electronics,Healthcare,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Security and Diplomacy
